welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kuala Terengganu, where the charm of traditional Malay culture meets the beauty of pristine beaches and crystal-clear waters. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its rich history and natural wonders. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: 全记鸡饭
restaurants.description: 全记鸡饭 is a chinese restaurant located in Kuala Terengganu.
restaurants.address: No 11-V, Tingkat Bawah, Jalan Kota Lama, 20300 Kuala Terengganu, Terengganu

restaurants.name: The Vinum Xchange
restaurants.description: The Vinum Xchange is a café located in Kuala Terengganu.
